title: Zolve - Telesales
subtitle: Location - Bengaluru, Work Type: Contract
content:
Zolve’s mission is simple: we want to make financial products accessible to everyone. Zolve offers the ambitious a plethora of products to simplify banking in the US, such as:

  • A Bank Account you can create from anywhere in the world in under five minutes
  • A high-limit Credit Card that helps build a healthy credit score
  • Easy, lightning-fast, cross-border money transfers with the best rates in the market

Zolve is expanding its horizons, and we’re excited to open our doors to everyone expanding theirs. We believe: that if space tourism is real, so is reaching for the stars.

RESPONSIBILITIES

  • Boost sales by reaching out to potential customers
  • Work on handling sales over the phone entirely
  • Collect desired information from the clients and maintain healthy relations with them
  • Understand the customer's requirements and demands and close the sales deal efficiently
  • Write down important information provided by the customer and follow up with them on a regular basis

REQUIREMENTS

  • Any graduate with relevant 6 months to 1 year experience in tele calling, tele sales or sales.
  • Must be available for 3 months contractual role
  • Excellent communication and listening skills
  • Ability to work alone or as part of a team
  • Ability to cope with rejection
  • Ability to remain calm in fast-paced environments
  • The ability to think on your feet

title: Unbox Robotics - Robotic Systems Engineer - Integration and Validation
subtitle: Location -  Pune Office, Work Type: Full time
content:
We at Unbox Robotics are revolutionizing warehouses and distribution centers by building the world's most compact, powerful, and flexible mobile robotics systems for the new age of warehousing. Our product is the World's 1st of its kind AI-powered parcel sorting robotic system that gets installed 10X faster, saves 50+% space and improves productivity by more than 3X with 50% fewer robots than that of the competition. Founded in 2019, we are backed by marquee investors and angels. We are looking to add to our team of thinkers, innovators and doers and would love to have you join us at the Pune, India office and build the future of on-demand robotics logistics solutions

Purpose:

Systems Engineering is a cross-functional engineering team that is responsible for planning and execution of design and development processes. This team will work along with hardware and software teams to generate the system level requirements. Systems engineering team is also responsible to plan and execute integration and testing activities to ensure that the systems meet the performance metrics.

In this team you will be working with various systems and subsystems like sensing and actuation systems that would be critical in the robots and robotic systems for automating the warehouse operations.

Department

Systems Engineering

Roles & Responsibilities:

  • Design and implement test frameworks for robotic systems. This will involve control of the real hardware.
  • Troubleshoot issues, resolve problems, and create evaluation reports.
  • Leads test processes and delivers results to necessary stakeholders with proper documentation.
  • Develops expected results for retesting on a variety of products.
  • Considers latest technologies and new approaches to tests, tools, and testing protocols.
  • Reviews, changes or upgrades to existing tests, tools, and testing protocols.
  • Provide technical support for product development teams as needed.
  • Proficiency in JIRA or any equivalent tool. Work in a dynamic Scrum based environment.
  • Travel to customer sites and collaborate with engineering and integration team members to troubleshoot and document existing systems.

Requirements:

  • Experience with motion control equipment, material handling systems, or robotics
  • Understanding of ROS with basic programming experience (C, C++ or python)
  • Experience in using CI/CD systems and version control eg. Git
  • Good knowledge of documentation and certification standards

Good to Have:

  • Basic understanding of electro-mechanical systems
  • Experience in working with Robotic Systems

Eligible candidates:

  • B.E/B-tech in Electrical, Mechanical, Mechatronics or any related discipline

We Value:

  • Research aptitude and relevant research experience.
  • Empirical problem formulation and solving capability.
  • A keen appetite for innovation and empirical problem solving ability using first principles.
  • Strong communication skills both oral and written at technical and management level.
  • Ability to communicate with customers to understand and document the simulation requirements, then ideate, plan, develop and deliver.
  • Skill and ability to: collect, curate, organize, synthesize and/or analyze data to summarize findings and develop conclusions and evidence-based recommendations.
  • Leadership that demonstrates professional will and persistence, - compassionate yet unyielding in achieving your team’s goals during uncertainties and personal humility.
  • Practice evidence-based management being data-driven and analytical in your problem solving
  • Flexible working hours, deadlines are kept to a minimum and they actively encourage personal projects and contribution to the open source community

Salary Range

Competitive Salary

Work Mode

On Campus

Work Experience

1+ years

title: avataar - 3D QA Associate - Platform Delivery

content:
Job Responsibilities

We are seeking a highly motivated, self-directed, enthusiastic, 3D Quality Assurance Lead/Manager to join our team in Bangalore, India. The ideal candidate would be well-versed in 3D, with a background in 3D modeling, lighting, UV unwrapping, rendering and who demonstrates photo-realistic asset creation of real-world objects. Maintain consistently high standards for accuracy, aesthetics, and productivity. Performs quantitative analysis of key process indicators to identify opportunities for process improvement.

Key Responsibilities

  • The candidate will measure the 3D output quality from process aspects (Photo-realism match) and trigger the defects back to the funnel with relevant feedback for systemic fix
  • Maintain consistently high standards for accuracy, aesthetics, and productivity
  • Performs quantitative analysis of key process indicators to identify opportunities for process improvement

Job Requirements:

  • 0-3 years of professional experience working in a fast-paced 3D production or QA environment
  • Must demonstrate an understanding of technical art production and end-to-end modelling, UV unwrapping, texturing and rendering
  • Fast turnaround on both hard-surface and organic modelling is a must
  • Must be very well versed in 3D domain and its related Software. Preferably MAYA, Zbrush and Substance Painter
  • Excellent communications, Presentation and Interpersonal skills

This position requires intrinsic design abilities, digital expertise, and acute attention to detail. The ability to manage multiple projects, communicate with key stakeholders and collaborate with production artists across nodes is essential. The ideal candidate will be accomplished in working with a variety of 2D and 3D software packages and demonstrate the ability to raise the quality bar in assessing the objects.

  • Well versed with design software like Maya, Zbrush, Photoshop and Substance Painter.
  • Adept with technical art production and end-to-end modelling - UV unwrapping, texturing and rendering
  • Proficient in conducting root cause analysis and suggesting corrective and preventive actions
  • Excellent written and verbal communication and presentation skills
  • General Project Management - experience in creating, documenting & refining processes

  • Strong escalation management experience with multiple stakeholders including business operations and product teams
  • Be accountable for developing and maintaining standard KPIs and delivering SLAs
  • Ability to plan, prioritize and execute in fast-moving delivery sprints

subtitle: Location -  Bangalore, Work Type: Full time
content:
Job Responsibilities:

As a leader of the AI Data team, you will be responsible for the team development, forming robust structures and frameworks for better productivity and leading the team in a way that aligns with the values and vision of the organization. You will also work closely with the R&D team in order to ensure timely and uninterrupted creation of the training datasets. You will be responsible for driving the initiatives and workflow on a day-to-day basis. You will also be responsible for the curation of trendy and aesthetic apparel from internet databases and approval after the team converts those into 3D assets.

What will you do:

  • Lead a team of skilled, energetic and dedicated young people with diverse backgrounds.
  • Work closely with the R&D team and understand their requirements in order to provide them with the training datasets for the development of AI.
  • You will also work in close tandem with other 3D leads in order to understand the functioning of the teams and collaborate towards the product roadmap.
  • Manage, plan and improve the process flow of the team working on the production of the datasets.
  • Understand and identify the best software and workflow for smooth, fast and timely delivery of the datasets.
  • Be responsible for driving the conversion of 2D apparel images into 3D and get those rendered as training datasets.
  • Be responsible for day-to-day activities and productivity of the team.
  • Understand and resolve the efficiency and scalability issues.
  • Research and keep the team updated with the latest trends and developments in the fashion industry, especially related to 3D, AR, XR.

Job Requirements

Are you a dreamer who believes in the endless possibilities of AI and deep learning? Do you want to shape the future of digital commerce? Are you looking to reimagine how consumers interact with brands? Are you looking to board the next rocketship? Then Avataar is your next destination and a once in a lifetime opportunity! Avataar.Me is looking to hire a sharp, personable, highly-organized Team Lead to take ownership of various project deliveries and support the R&D team. This is an opportunity to work with a stellar platform design, product, and engineering team and gain first-hand experience in delivering a product experience. The position will be based in Bangalore and you will be a part of the 3D Platform Delivery team and will report directly to the VP - Platform Delivery.

What we look for:

  • Graduate, preferably from a top-tier design college.
  • Someone with knowledge of apparel CAD and 3D software like Clo3D, Marvellous Designer, Maya, etc.
  • Should have knowledge and understanding of garment patterns and garment construction.
  • Should be well-versed with the jargons and vocabulary used in the fashion industry.
  • Should have at least 2 years prior experience of leading a team of at least 5 people.

tags: 0-2, 2-5, 5-8, c, c++, cuda, opencl, deep-learning, PyTorch, TensorFlow, Caffe2, computer-vision
content:
Job Responsibilities:

At Avataar Reality labs, we are pushing the boundaries of what is possible in AR/VR and enabling the consumer shift to metaverse at scale. We are building the neural engine to empower the creation, rendering and manipulation of AR/XR content across devices. Our work involves solving challenging problems at the intersection of Computer Vision, Graphics and Deep Learning.

As a ML Compiler Engineer, you will be working on building the framework for optimizing and deploying computer vision models across devices, making best use of modern parallel environments.

  • Proficiency in C/C++
  • Strong programming experience in CUDA or OpenCL.
  • Strong grasp of CPU and GPU performance challenges and optimization techniques.
  • Experience working with at least one deep-learning library (e.g., PyTorch, Jax,TensorFlow, Caffe2). This experience should include optimization of new algorithms.

Preferred Requirements:

  • Experience working with WebAssembly.
  • Experience in shipping computer vision or image processing products to customers

title: avataar - Business Development Representative
subtitle: Location -  Bangalore, Work Type: Full time
content:
This position brings challenges and rewards of being part of the initial SDR team at Avataar. You are required to be multidimensional, but the primary responsibility is to do market research, connect with customers through email\LI\phone, set up meetings, understand their pain points, and suggest solutions, with creative follow-ups leading to sales closure. This position is an integral part of our sales engine and you will work directly with the co-founders to “hunt” for high-value opportunities. This collaboration makes this role unique and one of a kind in the industry. The incumbent is expected to excel in this role and pave his/her own path to becoming a successful Account Executive in the next 18-24 months. BDRs are focused on the front end of the sales cycle and are the face of Avataar. This individual must be a highly motivated, outgoing, self-starter who is able to identify and develop opportunities from multiple sources including prospect lists, and individual research.

What would make you successful in this role?

  • Intellectually Hungry - You never stop learning and asking questions
  • Integrity - You challenge the status quo when you’ve found a better way and you do the right thing no matter what
  • “Get it done” mentality - You are proactive and execute with brilliant focus and a relentless spirit
  • Collaborative - You care about your own career goals, in addition to the success of your team
  • Driven - You challenge yourself to go above and beyond your responsibilities

Job Requirements:

We don't think anyone is the finished article, you should always be looking for ways to develop in your role. So if you don't tick all of these boxes, don't let that put you off, we want to know where you may need some support. However, some hard requirements are:

  • High in TQ(Technology Quotient). Experience with Sales Tech Stack(e.g. Hubspot, Outreach, Salesloft, Zoominfo, Lusha, etc) is desired
  • Proven work experience as an Enterprise Business Development Representative or similar roles
  • Hands-on experience with multiple sales techniques (including cold calls)
  • Familiarity with MS Excel (analyzing spreadsheets and charts)
  • Understanding of sales performance metrics
  • Strong written and verbal communication skills.
  • Must be organized, detailed and process-oriented
  • Must be a self-starter with the ability to work independently or in a team environment
  • Ability to manage multiple tasks and use good judgment in resolving difficult issues
  • Willing to work in the US time zone(6 pm-3 am)
  • Open to learning best in class sales processes
Apply

title: udaan - Accounts Receivables & Payables - Lead
subtitle: Location - Multiple locations, Work Type: Full Time
content:
udaan is a B2B ecommerce platform that brings traders, wholesalers, distributors, retailers, and manufacturers in India on to a single platform. Our goal is to make ‘doing business’ easy in India & make B2B commerce convenient and efficient.

udaan Capital is the NBFC arm of udaan & offers credit services to buyers and sellers on and off udaan’s B2B ecommerce platform to grow their business further. This space is largely untapped with less than 10% of MSMEs having access to working capital loans from financial institutions. In this way, udaan is uniquely positioned to formalize &scale trade credit.

Department Hierarchy

Credit

Experience range

8 years - 12 years

Role Description

Function: Credit

Sub Function: Receivables & Payables Management

Location: Bangalore

Reports to: Finance Head – Capital

Team Composition: 1-2 Direct Reports

Job Responsibilities

  • Ensuring correct accounting of revenue / expenses and corresponding accounts receivable / Payable.
  • Ensuring appropriate financial policies, procedures, and internal controls are in place, documented, and operating as intended.
  • Ensuring all processes are operating efficiently and effectively.
  • Designing, configurating and rolling out of new initiatives for bringing productivity and efficiency in the process
  • Setting up benchmark for quality basis best practices of industry
  • Closing operational / month-end activities
  • Handling internal and statutory audit and managing compliance and stakeholder management
  • Daily Funds flow Management and reconciliation

Functional Competencies

  • Problem solving: Ability to work in ambiguity and solve a given business problem and provide relevant inputs for key organization decisions
  • Data driven/ analytical: Process and analyse large volume of multiple data streams to enable meeting company targets
  • Collaborative skills: Coordinate with the internal and external teams for inputs and reporting requirements and navigate these relationship dynamics in a high growth, young, agile business environment.
  • Results orientation: Working on daily numbers, short-term goals and long-term milestones set by business and efficacy. Meeting these milestones would be critical to create success.
  • Business and Commercial Acumen

Candidate Profile

  • Should have 8-10 years of demonstrated experience of working in process oriented and high-quality work environments.
  • Qualification required: C.A. / CFA / MBA Finance
  • Experience in FinTech/ Banking / Telecom preferred
  • Excellent Excel knowledge and ability to navigate large volumes of data
  • Should possess strong understanding in the areas of financial applications and accounting standards.
Apply

title: udaan - IT Business Relationship Management
subtitle: Location - Bengaluru, Karnataka, India, Work Type: Full Time
content:
Founded in 2016 with a vision to 'transform the trade ecosystem in India leveraging technology,’ udaan is India’s largest business-to-business e-commerce platform. It has operations across categories including fruits and vegetables, FMCG, staples, lifestyle, electronics, home & kitchen, pharma, toys and general merchandise.

udaan is solving core trade problems faced by small and medium businesses, that are unique to India, through its unique India-fit low-cost business model by leveraging technology and bringing the benefits of eCommerce to them. It is a one stop shop for all business requirements in the b2b space. udaan has built inclusive tech tools for Bharat, specially catering to the needs of brands, retailers, and manufacturers, providing them a level playing field to scale, trade and grow businesses.

Learn more about us: https://udaan.com/

Department Hierarchy

Business Relationship Management

Experience range

10 years - 12 years

Job Responsibilities

This role is responsible for acting as a customer’s advocate within IT and play a neutral role. This is a massively impactful role and you'll have great opportunities to develop & foster various skill sets and expected to be an Individual contribute to a large extend. You will be responsible for driving the IT initiatives to various BU, understand the gaps between IT and respective business, bridge gaps if any,work with business on the business expansion plans and align the other IT functions towards the smooth support needs towards BU.

Below are some of the key responsibilities.

  • Build and maintain strong, long-lasting customer relationships
  • Develop trusted advisor relationships with customer stakeholders and executive sponsors.
  • Be an IT business partner for the BU (Work as the voice of customer ).

title: udaan - Business Development
subtitle: Location - Bengaluru, Karnataka, India, Work Type: Full Time
content:
udaan is a B2B ecommerce platform that brings traders, wholesalers, distributors, retailers, and manufacturers in India on to a single platform. Our goal is to make ‘doing business’ easy in India & make B2B commerce convenient and efficient.

udaan Capital is the NBFC arm of udaan & offers credit services to buyers and sellers on and off udaan’s B2B ecommerce platform to grow their business further. This space is largely untapped with less than 10% of MSMEs having access to working capital loans from financial institutions. In this way, udaan is uniquely positioned to formalize &scale trade credit.

Learn more about us: https://udaan.com/

Role Description

Function: Credit

Sub Function: Seller Side

Location: Bangalore

Travel Frequency: Minimal

Experience range

6 years - 12 years

What are we looking for?

The Strategic Partnerships team is the growth engine of udaan Capital and is responsible for building a large scale, sustainable and high-quality SME loan book by partnering with Enterprises as an Anchor. The role will require extensive networking within our target industries by engaging with CXOs and Founders to build a healthy deal pipeline and ensure timely closure of Anchor Partnerships

Job Responsibilities

  • Acquiring Mid to Large scale Anchors (Brands, Platforms, Manufacturers etc.) for providing invoice financing solutions for their Distributors, Dealers and Retailers.
  • Being the brand ambassador of udaan and udaanCapital - demonstrate the highest level of integrity, responsiveness and customer centricity and tirelessly advocate for adoption of products/services of udaanCapital and udaan with anchor partners.
  • Networking with CXOs and other decision makers across industry engagement forums to generate industry insights and build innovative industry specific GTM strategies
  • Responsible for portfolio building and managing the network of leads received via anchors by coordinating with the Sales and Central Underwriting teams
  • Maintaining the health of the portfolio and ensuring profitability of the loan book
  • Partnering with key stakeholders of the Anchors and growing the relationship to capture higher penetration of the program
  • Collaborating with Product, Technology and Policy teams to improve the value proposition of the product and further improve the user experiences

KRAs & KPIs of the role

  • Anchor Acquisition - Acquiring Mid to Large scale brands/platforms for invoice financing solutions
  • Book Building – Partnering with Sales team effectively to drive higher conversion of leads to borrowers and driving utilisation and AUM building by coordinating with Anchor
  • P&L Management – Negotiating right commercials with Anchors, optimising the lead to borrower conversions, and keeping delinquencies under tight control by effective program management by partnering with internal and external stakeholders

Functional Competencies

  • Customer Centricity and Problem Solving: Understanding the industry nuances and customer requirements in detail and thereby offering customized lending solutions
  • Stakeholder Management: Ability to collaborate with diverse external and internal stakeholders to onboard and scale Anchor programs
  • Cross Functional Integration: Coordinate with Sales, Central Underwriting and Product teams to continuously upgrade the Customer Value Propositions and drive better user experience
  • Perseverance: Individual need to be confident, self-starter and enthusiastic with a strong sense of self-discipline, drive, and urgency

Candidate Profile

  • 5-8 years of B2B Sales/Partnerships background with strong understanding of the corporate landscape in India
  • Proven track record of acquiring brands/platforms and familiarity with navigating complex organisations to identify decision makers and closing deals
  • Demonstrate excellent stakeholder management and collaboration skills to work in a highly fast paced environment
  • Passionate about problem solving with 1st principle approach keeping customer as the focus
  • Basic understanding of Supply Chain Financing and SME lending would be a plus
Apply

title: udaan - Direct Taxation
subtitle: Location - Multiple locations, Work Type: Full Time
content:
Founded in 2016 with a vision to 'transform the trade ecosystem in India leveraging technology,’ udaan is India’s largest business-to-business e-commerce platform. It has operations across categories including fruits and vegetables, FMCG, staples, lifestyle, electronics, home & kitchen, pharma, toys and general merchandise.

udaan is solving core trade problems faced by small and medium businesses, that are unique to India, through its unique India-fit low-cost business model by leveraging technology and bringing the benefits of eCommerce to them. It is a one stop shop for all business requirements in the b2b space. udaan has built inclusive tech tools for Bharat, specially catering to the needs of brands, retailers and manufacturers, providing them a level playing field to scale, trade and grow businesses.

Department Hierarchy

Taxation

Experience range

1 year - 3 years

Role Description

  • Responsible to manage end to end TDS compliances including but not limited to TDS report validations, payments, rationalisation and other related matters.
  • Responsible to manage end to end withholding tax compliances in relation to foreign payments including but not limited to report validations, payments, documentations, rationalisation and other related matters.
  • Responsible to manage end to end TCS compliances including but not limited to report validations, payments, documentations, rationalisation and other related matters.
  • Ensure timely and accurate filing of all TDS and Withholding tax returns.
  • Prepare and review advance tax calculations for the group entities and payment of the same within due dates
  • Provide internal tax advisory services and support on direct tax related matters to the business team and liaise with corporate finance, legal, business and operations teams for direct tax related issues.
  • rive, manage, and co-ordinate tax audits, transfer pricing audits, and filing of the same for the Group.
  • Preparation of Income Tax computation and filing of Income Tax Returns for the group entities.
  • Responsible for filing of various returns in relation to international transaction as stipulated under Direct tax.
  • Responsible for applying for and obtaining the Lower withholding certificates for the group entities.
  • Liaise with tax authorities and manage tax assessment and litigations for the Group including preparing replies to various notices issued by Income Tax department, preparation of Income tax scrutiny submission, appearance before income tax Authority, submission to TDS wing of Income tax department on various matter.
  • Provide support to teams during statutory audits and other audit assignments.
  • Review current and deferred tax provision
  • Coordination with tech folks for driving tech developments related to direct tax functions.
  • Establish appropriate system or processes for tax risk management for the Group and their continuous improvement of the same.
  • Lead and coordinate ad-hoc tax-driven business initiatives.

Candidate Profile

  • Qualified Chartered Accountant with 1-2 years of tax experience in an accounting firm and/ or MNC handling corporate tax or direct tax related matters
  • Basic knowledge of Domestic and international taxation laws and regulations
  • Demonstrate strong interpersonal, communication and presentation skills
  • Strong analytical and problem-solving skills and meticulous
  • Mature, proactive, resourceful and hands-on with good initiative.
  • Fast worker with ability to work well under stress.

Functional Competencies

  • Problem solving: Solve business problem with multiple data streams impacting decision making.
  • Data driven/ analytical: Process and analyse volume of multiple data streams to enable meeting business targets.
  • Collaborative skills: Cross-functional working and engagement with senior leaders to create success. Seamlessly navigate relationship dynamics in a high growth, young, agile business environment.
  • Results orientation: Deliver on daily numbers, short-term goals and long-term milestones set by business and efficacy.
  • Strong business and commercial acumen

What we offer

  • Hybrid work model
  • Robust insurance policy (medical, accidental)
  • Car lease through vendors
  • Gratuity

content:
udaan is a B2B ecommerce platform that brings traders, wholesalers, distributors, retailers, and manufacturers in India on to a single platform. Our goal is to make ‘doing business’ easy in India & make B2B commerce convenient and efficient.

udaan Capital is the NBFC arm of Udaan & offers credit services to buyers and sellers on and off udaan’s B2B ecommerce platform to grow their business further. title: 10club - Associate Operations
subtitle: Location -  Jalandhar, Work Type: Full time
content:
This role is for an experienced professional, willing to take a seat on the rocket ship that has already launched. We are an e-commerce brand acquirer, and all our operations are focused on marketplace first businesses. The candidate selected for this role will work to ensure our company’s portfolio brands are growing aggressively and out do industry benchmarks and achieve what we would call explosive growth. This is a demanding role but since you are still reading this job description, we have concluded you love a good challenge!

This journey is all about taking our acquired brand from 1x to 10x in 36 months, while maintaining healthy margins. The acquisition happens at the very beginning of their boom, so a strong empathy towards the sellers and an ability to work through the chaos of their early build is a very important aspect of this role.

Responsibilities:

With an ambition to be a leading player in the sporting category 10Club is strengthening its base in the Sporting Capital of India, Jalandhar. Jalandhar is famous for its sports industry and equipment manufactured in Jalandhar has been used in many international sporting games including Olympics, Commonwealth Games, Asian Games, among others. We are looking forward to have an Associate Operations for our Jalandhar Brand Operations.

We want to have some one with an entrepreneurial mind-set, an action junkie, a problem solver, people's person & someone with a huge appetite for learning !

If you have worked in e-commerce business, you will have an edge. And on top of that if you are passionate about sports, there can’t be a better place for you

As an Operations Associate, you will be driving all the on-ground operations for the brand that we acquire and help in driving brands growth.

  • Demand and Supply planning
  • Inventory & Warehouse Management
  • Re-seller operations
  • Monitoring and exceeding Customer Order SLA's
  • Order management
  • Procurement Planning & Vendor Management
  • New product development
  • Implementation of SOP’s
  • Manpower Planning
  • Operational cost optimization
  • Network Optimization to reduce Cost per Delivery.
  • Safety, security and business continuity planning
  • Strategize and execute central initiatives as well as contribute with ideas for effectively scaling up the operations for your brand.

Requirements:

  • S&OP
  • E-Commerce Fulfillment Center Operations
  • Vendor Management
  • Process Development
  • People Management.
  • Planning & Budgeting
  • Network Planning

Experience – 3-4 years’ experience in E-commerce operations preferably from Amazon. Happy to meet Founders/Entrepreneurs and candidates from e commerce marketplace.

title: 10club - Finance Associate Analyst
subtitle: Location -  Remote, Work Type: Full time
content:
This role is for an experienced professional, willing to take a seat on the rocket ship that has already launched. We are an e-commerce brand acquirer, and all our operations are focused on marketplace first businesses. The candidate selected for this role will work to ensure our company’s portfolio brands are growing aggressively and out do industry benchmarks and achieve what we would call explosive growth. This is a demanding role but since you are still reading this job description, we have concluded you love a good challenge!

This journey is all about taking our acquired brand from 1x to 10x in 36 months, while maintaining healthy margins. The acquisition happens at the very beginning of their boom, so a strong empathy towards the sellers and an ability to work through the chaos of their early build is a very important aspect of this role.

Responsibilities:

  • Envisage data structures and tables to capture information that allows right business analysis.
  • Develop recurring and/or ad hoc dashboards using SQL/Python codes.
  • Partner in the implementation of the technology stack across the organization.
  • Work with various stakeholders to understand the business problem and come up with the right information set that sheds light on the issue.
  • Optimize the database for quick turnaround and efficient turn around of analytics.
  • Experience of 2-3 years in the e-commerce industry in India is preferred.

title: udaan - Underwriter
subtitle: Location - Bangalore, Karnataka, India, Work Type: Full Time
content:
udaan is a B2B ecommerce platform that brings traders, wholesalers, distributors, retailers, and manufacturers in India on to a single platform. Our goal is to make ‘doing business’ easy in India & make B2B commerce convenient and efficient.

udaan Capital is the NBFC arm of Udaan & offers credit services to buyers and sellers on and off udaan’s B2B ecommerce platform to grow their business further. This space is largely untapped with less than 10% of MSMEs having access to working capital loans from financial institutions. In this way, udaan is uniquely positioned to formalize &scale trade credit.

Learn more about us: https://udaan.com/

Role Description

Function: Credit

Sub Function: Seller Side

Location: Bangalore

Reports to: Head Underwriting

Travel Frequency: Minimal

Department Hierarchy

Credit Policy

Experience range

1 year - 3 years

Job Responsibilities

  • Deciding trade credit for buyers (lending amount & period)
  • Responsible completion of timely credit appraisals
  • Adhering to strict TAT for underwriting files
  • Maintaining quality of underwriting as per SOP
  • Recommending deviation cases to the higher level or approving authority as per delegation matrix
  • Vendor Management

KRAs of the role

  • Delinquency Management – Maintain lower NPAs
  • TAT Management – Strict TAT to be maintained for underwriting files
  • Managing Quality of Processing – to maintain quality of underwriting adhering to SOP
  • Vendor Management – coordinate with vendors for getting various verification done for customers

Functional Competencies

  • Problem Solving: Resolution of overdue accounts by coordinating with a sales team. Coordination with Operations team for due/ overdue PDD process
  • Stakeholder Management: Meet Customers to understand them better for better credit appraisal
  • Cross-functional integration: Coordinate with sales and operations team for efficient functioning of the entire process

Candidate Profile

  • Qualification: CA/MBA Finance/B. Com
  • Must have a minimum 1 - 3 years of work experience in SME underwriting for products like Invoice Finance, Business Loans; prior experience in Fintech/NBFCs preferred
  • Thorough understanding of SME Financing and Credit processes
  • Good at market intelligence, should be able to provide inputs & feedback for policy and process improvement
  • Eye for detail/Diligent Personality
Apply
